todayWeather.title: Today's Weather
todayWeather.description: Check the weather in your area with this app. This Application uses OpenWeather API to fetch real-time weather data and display it in an easy-to-understand format.

instagramClone.title: Instagram Clone
instagramClone.description: A simple Instagram clone app that allows users to sign up, log in, upload photos, and view a feed of posts from other users. Built with Java and Firebase for backend services.

studentSystem.title: Student System
studentSystem.description: A comprehensive student management system that allows for course registration, grade tracking, and communication between students and faculty.

iNeedYourMessage.title: I Need Your Message
iNeedYourMessage.description: A messaging app that allows users to send and receive messages in real-time.
